column4: i have a Nvidia 7600GS i've installed the restricted drivers checked online through the forums played around with the xorg.conf but still get only 50hz refresh rate
you realise the human eye can't really detect frequencies over about 30?
then i don't know why i am squinting here and things are fine when i boot back into xp :/
i couldn't remember what happened when i tried using nvidia-settings
9/10 times all your pc needs is a reoot
